import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {AiFillStar} from 'react-icons/ai' import './index.css' const RestaurantCard = props => { const {restaurant} = props const { imageUrl, name, cuisine, rating, totalReviews, id, ratingColor, } = restaurant return (

  • {name}

    {cuisine}

    {rating}

    ({totalReviews} rating)

    • ) } export default RestaurantCard
